Reproducible Research

22 March 2013

I have decided to adopt Reproducible Research in my research life recently after reading blogs of Yihui Xie. Today I came across a very useful blog of Carl Boettiger. Essentially he promotes the same idea as Yihui but pushes it further to online publicated lab notebook. I believe the idea that bioinformaticians also need lab notebooks to keep track of everyday research. To maintain an electronic research notebook might be a good strategy to get ideas straight and keep records. You might want to check these two interviews of him (click here and here) to get a better idea. You might also want to check his workflow in using R for computational ecology researches.
